abstract: Is Facebook positioning itself to take on PayPal? Already on the path to becoming an advertising powerhouse, the social networking company is laying the groundwork for its second act: a virtual currency system that some day could turn into a multibillion-dollar business.
snippet: Is Facebook positioning itself to take on PayPal? Already on the path to becoming an advertising powerhouse, the social networking company is laying the groundwork for its second act: a virtual currency system that some day could turn into a multi...
lead_paragraph: For all its success, Google is often criticized for being a one-trick pony. After 12 years, the Internet search company is still struggling to find a significant new revenue source to supplement its lucrative text advertising business.

headline.main: Is Facebook Positioning Itself to Take on PayPal?

abstract: Verizon has invested an undisclosed amount into Geodelic, a start-up that makes it easy for consumers to discover nearby businesses via their mobile phones.
snippet: Verizon has invested an undisclosed amount into Geodelic, a start-up that makes it easy for consumers to discover nearby businesses via their mobile phones.

headline.main: Verizon Backs Geodelic, a Maker of Location Apps
